about_text1: The AquaDoctor.uz brand was created in 2017. More than 1000 buyers have confirmed the quality of our products. Thanks to the wide range of products, AquaDoctor.uz chemicals are successfully used for water care at various facilities:

customer_text_1: Discovery plast was founded in 2020 and manufactures plastic building materials for the PN - 10 and PN - 16 pool filtration system (pipes, fittings, couplings, elbows, adapters and glue for PVC pipes). Discovery plast has the latest technological infrastructure, equipment and mold systems. Our goal is to become a global company in our sector and develop along the way with technology. We guarantee our customers quality, reliability and availability of plastic pipes and connecting equipment.
customer_text_2:
European standards
Production technology
Raw materials
Employees
customer_text_3: History: In 2020, Discovery plast began production of U-PVC pipes using European technology and international standards. In the same year, the company successfully entered the market of the Republic of Uzbekistan. In 2024, Discovery plast began production of U-PVC connecting equipment. Today, Discovery plast is the only manufacturer of plastic pipes and connecting equipment in the Republic of Uzbekistan.
footer2: We are located at the address: Tashkent, Usta Shirin St., 116
